FACULTY OF SCIENCE


Computer Science - Staff - D. Garg

Mrs. Deepti Garg

BIO

Mrs Garg is working as Senior lecturer at the Department of Computer Science.

CONTACT ME

E-Mail: deepti@mopipi.ub.bw
Phone:
Office: Block 232, Office 244

Areas & Projects

  • Mrs Garg has taught courses in the undergraduate programme offered by the Department right from level 1 to level 4. These include CSI 392 – Human Computer Interaction, CSI 482– Information Systems Engineering, CSI – Database Concepts, ICT 121- Computing Skills fundamental I, ICT 122- Computing Skills fundamental II, CSI 243- Functional programming. She participates in Industrial attachments supervision in the department and also supervises final year undergraduate student’s project.

Research

  • Mrs. Garg has 10 journal publications to her credit and has participated in several National and International conferences. Her research interests are adoption of IT in developing countries and developing methodology for Website evaluation. She has taken lead in studying the adoption factor of 3G technology in developing countries to identify new factor of adoption.
